item.title: $ sudo make my summer thrilling
item.description: Itâ€™s been a while since I posted or blogged about something, and the situation looks still the same… Coming to some good news… My last blog ended with the submission of my GSoC proposal. From the framing of my sentence you would’ve guessed already that my GSoC2020 proposal got accepted. I wanted to tell you about this on the day I received my acceptance letter but this semester drained the soul out of me just like what happened to prison mike in prison.
